item.title: 随着全国麻疹病例的增加，芝加哥已成为美国最新的疫情中心城市。

item.title: 市场报告显示，美国经济的就业人数强劲，通货膨胀率也在下降，但一些小企业主告诉 @ABC News，他们仍然感觉到了压力。
item.description:

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: 帕蒂-博伊德是摇摆 60 年代的中心人物。现在，她在佳士得拍卖行出售的大量信件、照片和其他物品让她成为焦点。
item.description:
Pattie Boyd was at the epicenter of the Swinging 60s. Now she comes into sharp focus through a trove of letters, photos and other items she is selling at Christie’s auction house. https://t.co/g4xlVC5U0T

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: 美国图书馆协会发布的新数据凸显了图书馆和学校因图书禁令和其他挑战而面临的日益激烈的斗争。
item.description:
New data released by the American Library Association highlights the growing battle libraries and schools face over book bans and other challenges. https://t.co/m6yWG7riil

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: "杀手真菌 "听起来像是科幻小说，但真菌感染每年造成全球约 170 万人死亡，比肺结核或疟疾的死亡人数还多。
item.description:
"Killer fungus" may sound like science fiction, but fungal infections kill an estimated 1.7 million people worldwide per year — more than tuberculosis or malaria. https://t.co/wbAmEzKcQS

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: 随着春季购房季的到来，越来越多急于出售房屋的房主降低了最初要价，以吸引潜在买家。

item.title: 气温的升高、积雪的减少和地面的变化迫使阿拉斯加历史悠久的艾迪塔罗德雪橇犬赛不得不适应不断变化的环境。
item.description:
Increased temperatures, lack of snow and ground changes have forced the Iditarod Trail Dog Sled Race, a longstanding Alaskan competition, to adapt to its changing environment. https://t.co/fUu72vQaoF

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: 美国移民和海关执法局的律师告诉 @ABC 新闻，因一名佛罗里达州警官死亡而被捕的危地马拉移民 Virgilio Aguilar Mendez 已被释放。
item.description:
Virgilio Aguilar Mendez, the teen migrant from Guatemala who was arrested following the death of a Florida police officer, has been freed from U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement's custody his lawyers told @ABC News. https://t.co/oLGyHsihvZ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: 公牛鲨是世界上最具攻击性的鲨鱼物种之一，其数量在 20 年间大幅增加，研究人员称，海水变暖是罪魁祸首。
item.description:
The number of bull sharks — one of the most aggressive species of shark in the world — increased significantly in a 20-year period, and researchers say warmer seawater is to blame. https://t.co/Pk1BIwE2vW

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：周五晚的 "百万大奖 "开奖号码公布后，还没有人宣布中奖，估计周二的下一次开奖的大奖将增至 8.75 亿美元。
item.description:
JUST IN: There has been no winner declared after numbers were drawn for Friday night's Mega Millions jackpot drawing, with the grand prize growing to an estimated $875 million for the next drawing on Tuesday. https://t.co/pKmRzHWrda

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: 南达科他州州长克里斯蒂.诺姆（Kristi Noem）在社交媒体上发布视频，宣传她在得克萨斯州一家牙科诊所接受的牙科治疗后，正面临着严格的审查，一家非营利组织在诉讼中声称她肯定与牙医有秘密的 "经济关系"。
item.description:
South Dakota Gov. Kristi Noem is facing scrutiny after posting video on social media promoting dental work she received from a practice in Texas, with a nonprofit claiming in a lawsuit that she must have a secret "financial relationship" with the dentists. https://t.co/Pq8p3aX1On

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: 根据一份新的联邦报告，2023 年仍有 MIS-C 病例发生，而未接种疫苗或接种疫苗后免疫力下降的儿童患这种疾病的风险最高。
item.description:
Cases of MIS-C are still occurring in 2023 and children who are unvaccinated or have waning immunity from previous vaccination are at the highest risk of developing the condition, according to a new federal report. https://t.co/uYEeQKaa0j

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: 官员称，一架波音 737-800 飞机在抵达俄勒冈州南部的目的地后，在飞行后检查中发现一块面板缺失。
item.description:

item.title: 25 岁的杰斯说，在确诊癌症后，他感到非常震惊，决定在社交媒体上记录自己的抗癌历程，以帮助人们提高对癌症的认识。
item.description:

item.title: 参议员伯尼-桑德斯（Bernie Sanders）提出了一项法案，希望将美国的工作周缩短至32小时，同时不损失工人的工资：
item.description:
Sen. Bernie Sanders has introduced a bill to reduce the workweek to 32 hours in the U.S. with no loss of pay for workers.

item.title: 研究人员确认了据信是世界上已知最古老的口红--一个装有深红色膏状物的华丽小石瓶。这件罕见的文物是在伊朗东南部发现的。
item.description:
Researchers have identified what is believed to be the world's oldest known lipstick – a small, ornate stone vial containing a deep red paste.

The rare artifact was discovered in southeastern Iran. https://t.co/AyWIAG25S5

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: 纽约市一名 32 岁的男子在地铁上开枪，造成一人重伤，检察官以 "自卫 "为由，没有对这名男子提出任何指控：
item.description:
No charges are being filed against the 32-year-old man who fired a gun on a New York City subway, critically injuring one person, prosecutors said, citing "self-defense."

item.title: 根据一份尸检报告，科罗拉多州一名男子在被宠物吉拉怪咬伤后被置于生命维持系统中，死于沙漠蜥蜴毒液引起的并发症。
item.description:

item.title: 狗拉雪橇运动已经从一种曾经在白雪皑皑地区非常重要的运输方式，转变为一种纪念北方历史的大众化越野娱乐活动。但气候变化正迫使艾迪塔罗德雪橇赛做出调整。
item.description:
Dogsledding has transitioned from a once-vital form of transportation in snow-covered regions to a popularized cross-country recreation that commemorates the history of the North.

But climate change is forcing the Iditarod to adapt. https://t.co/y881f2zyN5 pic.twitter.com/egZNf5k59W

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: 司法部宣布，蒙大拿州一名男子承认在 "大胆计划 "中对巨型杂交绵羊进行基因工程改造并将其出售给狩猎机构。
item.description:
Montana man pleads guilty to genetically engineering giant hybrid sheep in "audacious scheme" to sell the species to hunting facilities, DOJ announces. https://t.co/JjxSCNzrdU

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: 一个强大的房地产贸易集团已同意取消数十年来帮助确定经纪人佣金的政策，以解决声称这些规则迫使人们支付人为抬高的卖房成本的诉讼。
item.description:
A powerful real estate trade group has agreed to do away with policies that for decades helped set agent commissions, moving to resolve lawsuits that claim the rules have forced people to pay artificially inflated costs to sell their homes. https://t.co/fu1kZcUl57

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: "你们为我和我的家人所做的一切真的很了不起"。前 UFC 冠军马克-科尔曼（Mark Coleman）在医院康复期间对自己还活着感到 "幸运和感激"，几天前他的家人说他曾帮助父母从俄亥俄州家中的火灾中获救。
item.description:
"What you have done for me and my family is truly remarkable." Former UFC champion Mark Coleman is "blessed and grateful" to be alive while recovering in the hospital, days after his family said he helped rescue his parents from a fire at their Ohio home. https://t.co/CNtDakW76b pic.twitter.com/nXzPHWdFSV

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 随着春季购房季的到来，越来越多急于出售房屋的房主降低了最初要价，以吸引潜在买家。

item.title: 美国司法部宣布，一名佛罗里达州男子因在哈马斯 10 月 7 日袭击以色列两周后给纽约市世界犹太人大会留下威胁性语音邮件而被判处六个月监禁。
item.description:

item.title: 前 UFC 冠军马克-科尔曼（Mark Coleman）在医院康复期间表示，他对自己还活着感到 "幸运和感激"，几天前他的家人说他曾帮助父母从俄亥俄州家中的火灾中获救。
item.description:
Former UFC champion Mark Coleman said he's "blessed and grateful" to be alive while recovering in the hospital, days after his family said he helped rescue his parents from a fire at their Ohio home. https://t.co/h1vRUmY50N

— ABC News (@ABC) March 15, 2024

item.title: 俄罗斯反对派领导人阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的葬礼结束后的几天里，成千上万的人继续在莫斯科南部的公墓外排队，等待向他的墓地献花。
item.description:
For days after the funeral of the Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny, thousands of people continued to line up outside the cemetery in southern Moscow waiting to lay flowers at his grave. https://t.co/y5qS6zdl3n

item.title: 众议员劳伦-博伯特（Lauren Boebert）在争取继续担任国会议员的过程中走着最狭窄的钢丝绳，但她的竞选团队警告说，现在还不能将她排除在外。
item.description:
Rep. Lauren Boebert is walking the narrowest of tightropes as she campaigns to remain in Congress — but operatives warn against writing her off just yet. https://t.co/x6FCebbEml
